sentences.en: A doctor can reduce a fracture or dislocation.
sentences.cn: 医生能使骨折或脱臼复位.

sentences.en: a fracture of the leg/skull
sentences.cn: 腿骨 / 颅骨骨折

sentences.en: A fracture pattern involving fan modes will generally give lower collapse.
sentences.cn: 包括扇型的折断图式一般给出较低的毁坏.

sentences.en: a hairline fracture
sentences.cn: 细小的裂缝

sentences.en: a stress fracture in his left knee
sentences.cn: 他左膝上的应力性骨折

sentences.en: At least one-third of all women over ninety have sustained a hip fracture.
sentences.cn: 超过90岁的所有女性中至少有1/3已经出现髋骨骨折。

sentences.en: Care must be exercised in the choice of fracture patterns.
sentences.cn: 必须注意折断图式的选择.

sentences.en: Concern for fracture has surely existed back to antiquity.
sentences.cn: 有关断裂的问题显然要追溯到古代.

sentences.en: Experimental difficulties are also compounded in solving problems in three - dimensional fracture mechanics.
sentences.cn: 用实验方法解决三维断裂力学中的问题也存在多种多样的困难.

sentences.en: Fracture is not the only way that a structure can fail.
sentences.cn: 断裂并非结构失效的唯一形式.

sentences.en: Fracture of the leg can be very serious in old people.
sentences.cn: 老年人腿骨骨折有可能成为严重疾患.

sentences.en: He suffered a hairline fracture of the right index finger.
sentences.cn: 他右手食指骨裂。

sentences.en: His leg fractured in two places.
sentences.cn: 他的一条腿有两处骨折。

sentences.en: Let the junction of the three fracture lines have a virtual displacement.
sentences.cn: 令三条折断线的相交处有一虚位移.

sentences.en: Perhaps there is a fracture in the water pipe.
sentences.cn: 也许水管有裂缝了.

sentences.en: The fracture of his left leg is very serious.
sentences.cn: 他的左腿骨折情况很严重.

sentences.en: The fracture surface traverses matrix as well as fibers and interface.
sentences.cn: 断裂表面横切过基体、纤维和界面.

sentences.en: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
sentences.cn: 巨大的压力造成岩石断裂。

sentences.en: The opposition has been fractured by bitter disputes.
sentences.cn: 反对党因为激烈的纠纷闹得分崩离析。

sentences.en: The state of knowledge about fracture surfaces is very meager.
sentences.cn: 有关断裂表面的知识非常缺乏.

sentences.en: We may continue the traction up to three weeks, until the fracture is healed.
sentences.cn: 我们可以继续牵引三周, 直到骨折痊愈为止.

phrases.tran_cn: 断裂判据，断裂准则；断裂指标

trans.tran_en: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks
